Articles.Content:
I'm trying to do the contract "Explore the Mun". I've got a green tick for the first part, "Fly by the Mun" but it won't tick off "Gather scientific data from the Mun". I did lots of experiments orbiting the Mun and it didn't work so I thought maybe I had to land on the Mun, but now I'm on the surface and it still won't work. Any ideas?

Edited December 22, 2016 by liquidmetalrob
Did you transmit/recover? Just collecting the experiment on site does not count in general for contracts (there are exceptions but not relevant here).
Oh OK, I have to actually transmit/recover the data, thanks. Can it be data from the Mun's orbit or does it have to be from the surface?

6 minutes ago, liquidmetalrob said:

Oh OK, I have to actually transmit/recover the data, thanks. Can it be data from the Mun's orbit or does it have to be from the surface?

It'll say if it has to be from the surface. I thought it said if it didn't too or at least implied it. "From Mun's Sphere of Influence" or something like that. But anyway, if it wants it from something more specific, it'll say so.

From anywhere within the SOI is good enough, actually. The contract will specify "from the surface of the Mun" otherwise.
 

Edited December 22, 2016 by bewing

23 hours ago, liquidmetalrob said:

Oh OK, I have to actually transmit/recover the data, thanks. Can it be data from the Mun's orbit or does it have to be from the surface?

The contract should tell you specifically, eg from space around the Mun or from the Mun's surface

14 hours ago, Lunar Sea said:

The contract should tell you specifically, eg from space around the Mun or from the Mun's surface

I think its, enter target SOI, transmit and return science from space around target, enter orbit, land and retrieve science from surface. 
So you need to get science from both space and surface, however as you need the science this should be automatically.
Transmit a crew report taken from the Mun's SOI.  That should complete it for you, sooner than when you return with the experiments you collected.
